named-query.name: Drink.findByName
named-query.query: SELECT D FROM Drink D WHERE D.name.name = :name

named-query.name: Drink.findByType
named-query.query: SELECT D FROM Drink D WHERE D.type = :type

named-native-query.name: Drink.findByNameNative
named-native-query.query: SELECT d.* FROM drinks.drink d WHERE d.name = :name

named-native-query.name: Drink.findByTypeNative
named-native-query.query: SELECT d.* FROM drinks.drink d WHERE d.type = :type
